text: Battleground is a 1949 American World War II action movie directed by William A. Wellman and stars Van Johnson, John Hodiak, Ricardo Montalb√°n, George Murphy, Marshall Thompson, James Whitmore, Douglas Fowley. It was distributed by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer and was nominated for 6 Oscars and won 2 Academy Awards in 1950. ==Other websites== * * Category:1949 war movies Category:1940s action movies Category:American action movies Category:World War II movies Category:MGM movies Category:Movies directed by William A. Wellman
title: Battleground (1949 movie)
